name: Check Site Suitability
description: Before selecting a location, verify that the site meets the Department of Consumer Affairs' Board of Cosmetology licensing guidelines. The Board will review your floorplan during the application review process to determine if a site meets board requirements, including considerations around bathroom access and an area designated for cleaning implements and tools, among other items.
after_completing_will_have: Floor plan of the tenant fit-out at your location, drawn to scale.
